metadata.description:
In the year 2082, beautiful Morea Doloniac is an ordinary employee in one of the biggest meta-national companies on the planet, the DWC. One day, she is nearly killed when commando squads execute, everywhere on the planet, members of her family. As the only survivor, she finds herself at the head of one of the main economic powers of the XXIth century.
More mysterious, the attempt on her life was a success...
She died... And yet, she is still alive!
metadata.name: Morea
